title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: Dokotoo Womens Sweaters Long Sleeve 1/4 Zip Pullover Polo V Neck Dressy Casual Tops

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, not itchy, and well-made, with one noting it hangs beautifully on the body. Customers describe it as incredibly soft and great for cold weather, with one noting it can be layered for additional warmth.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy!
items.body: arrived today- fast shipping. Beautiful weave, great color. Comfortable. Hefty enough for warmth, but not too heavy to wear indoors. Good loose fit, not sloppy- true to size. Considering other colors. Read more
items.author: TN family

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING!
items.body: This is perfect. Very complimentary to the body. Adds just enough warmth that you need and is beautiful. Read more
items.author: Crevoldt

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft lightweight sweater
items.body: Sweater is soft and true to size. It’s thin so it’s perfect for “cold weather in the south” or layered to make it warmer. It’s not as dark purple in person. I returned it because I ordered a different sweater that was closer to the color purple that I really wanted. Read more
items.author: zkryhyza

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t Wait to Wear It!
items.body: Just arrived today! Tried it on right away.. I got the charcoal gray color. It is wonderful. Bought size M, and it’s perfect; I could even wear a T-shirt under it if I wanted. Feels very cozy. Can’t wait to wear it! For reference, I’m generally between a10 and 12 in tops. Would not size up unless you want a bulky fit! Read more
items.author: imbcmd

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short after a wash.
items.body: I really like the color and fit of this sweater, but the length shrunk quite a bit after I washed it. It’s actually difficult for me to wear now because it is too short but still fits well everywhere else. I had this problem with another 1/4 zip style from this brand. Initially, I loved them but now feel uncomfortable with the short length Read more
items.author: J.Bailey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, stylish, cute!
items.body: Love love love this sweater!! It is warm for the “colder” Oregon winter weather. I received several compliments too! The half zip is great if you get a little warm and it’s soft too!! It is a tad see through but easily fixed with a cute colored camisole. Size was perfect, I weigh 170ish and wear a Large, very true to size! Buy it! Buy it now! You won’t regret! Read more
items.author: A.B

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Proceed with Caution
items.body: ! Caution ! I ordered 2 colors in Small. When laying them on top of each other, one appeared M , the other S. I kept the white with black stripes (S). The material is soft and stretchy; not sure how long it was hold an S shape. I washed it inside-out and the post-wash sweater now looks many years old. Pilling everywhere, black fuzzy remnants all over. I used a pilling machine to remove the fuzz and used scissors for light trimming. It didn’t revive the look to brand new. Read more
items.author: Unicorn26

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good fit!
items.body: I'm 5'2" and 155 lbs. I ordered the white and purple in Medium. I usually wear Large to xl. Great fit! A little roomy but just right! Very pretty. Can't wait for cooler weather to wear them. Read more
items.author: Mema

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A3 Purple, A2 Green, A1 Red, B1 Blue, B Green, B2 Brown, Ablack-white, Bwhite-brown, B Blue, B White, Bwhite-black, B Red, B1 Rose, A1 Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
